root: ^Look! I found these in Miss Ann's garden!
^She says they just started to bloom. She's says the flowers aren't growing like they used to which is so, so sad.
^Oh.. does she know you've plucked these?
^Well.. no. But they're so pretty! Miss Ann always gave me some to take home but they lose their petals so fast...
^You shouldn't pick from her garden too much, Nancy.
^If you're worried about losing petals, why don't I make something to make the flower last a bit longer?
^task:My Tenth Task $Nancy $Nancy's so adorable but she really needs to leave Miss Ann's garden alone. At least with this she won't pick up every she comes across.
